house_listing.house_description: Bank owned...Large lot, spanish motif, 2 car detached garage with attached bonus room/bedroom, den in rear could be 5th bedroom, buyer to verify sq. Footage.Listing agent has copies of permits for review.Sold as-is.Lots of potential in great neighborhood, call l/a for additional details. Property in process of trash/out, property in need of tlc/minor repairs.
house_listing.firm_name: RE/MAX R.E. Specialists RE/MAX R.E. Specialists
